mapper.sql: meetingid, uuid, periodmeetingid, meetingroomid, subject, description, starttime, endtime, periodendtime, duration, fee, amount, servicememo, bookstaffid, bookbranchid, qrcode, periodflag, skipholidayflag, periodtype, auditstatus, auditresult, orgid, createtime, createstaffid, updatetime, updatestaffid, status
mapper.select:
select
from meeting where meetingid = #{meetingid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status='1'

SELECT m.*, st.name as bookstaffname, br.name as bookbranchname, mr.name AS meetingroomname, l.name AS locationname FROM meeting m LEFT JOIN meetingroom mr ON (m.status = '1' AND m.meetingroomid = mr.meetingroomid) LEFT JOIN staff st ON (m.bookstaffid = st.staffid) LEFT JOIN branch br ON (m.bookbranchid = br.branchid) LEFT JOIN location l ON (mr.locationid = l.locationid) WHERE mr.orgid = #{orgid} and mr.status='1'
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM location l1 LEFT JOIN location l2 ON (l1.locationid = l2.parentid AND l2.status = '1') LEFT JOIN location l3 ON (l3.parentid = l2.locationid AND l3.status = '1') LEFT JOIN location l4 ON (l4.parentid = l3.locationid AND l4.status = '1') WHERE l1.status = '1' AND l1.locationid =#{locationid} AND (l1.locationid = mr.locationid OR l2.locationid = mr.locationid OR l3.locationid = mr.locationid OR l4.locationid = mr.locationid ) )
and (m.subject like #{search} )
order by m.starttime desc

select
from meeting where status='1' and meetingroomid=#{meetingroomid} and #{signtime}>= starttime and #{signtime}< endtime
select count(1) from meeting m where m.orgid=#{orgid} and m.status='1'and m.auditstatus in ('1','9') and (m.periodflag='0' or m.periodmeetingid>0) and m.starttime<=now() and m.endtime>now()

select
from meeting where periodmeetingid = #{periodmeetingid} and starttime>=#{starttime} and status='1'
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into meeting (uuid, periodmeetingid, meetingroomid, subject, description, starttime, endtime, periodendtime, duration, fee, amount, servicememo, bookstaffid, bookbranchid, qrcode, periodflag, skipholidayflag, periodtype, auditstatus, auditresult, orgid, createtime, createstaffid, updatetime, updatestaffid, status) values (#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{periodmeetingid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{meetingroomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{periodendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{servicememo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{periodflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{skipholidayflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{periodtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{auditstatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{auditresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatestaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update meeting
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
periodmeetingid = #{periodmeetingid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
meetingroomid = #{meetingroomid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
periodendtime = #{periodendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
servicememo = #{servicememo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bookstaffid = #{bookstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bookbranchid = #{bookbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
periodflag = #{periodflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
skipholidayflag = #{skipholidayflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
periodtype = #{periodtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
auditstatus = #{auditstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
auditresult = #{auditresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createstaffid = #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatestaffid = #{updatestaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
where meetingid = #{meetingid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update meeting set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, periodmeetingid = #{periodmeetingid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, meetingroomid = #{meetingroomid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, periodendtime = #{periodendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, servicememo = #{servicememo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bookstaffid = #{bookstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bookbranchid = #{bookbranchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qrcode = #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, periodflag = #{periodflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, skipholidayflag = #{skipholidayflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, periodtype = #{periodtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, auditstatus = #{auditstatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, auditresult = #{auditresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createstaffid = #{createstaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatestaffid = #{updatestaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR} where meetingid = #{meetingid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update meeting
subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
periodendtime = #{periodendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
servicememo = #{servicememo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatestaffid = #{updatestaffid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
auditstatus = #{auditstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auditresult = #{auditresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
periodflag = #{periodflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
skipholidayflag = #{skipholidayflag,jdbcType=CHAR},
periodtype = #{periodtype,jdbcType=CHAR},
where meetingid = #{meetingid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and orgid=#{orgid}
